Articles.Content:
I was playing KSP and this weirdness (bug?) happened, so I made a video. Have fun watching it!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/pZaAa259mD0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
Ah yeah, Extraplanetary launchpad things do that sometimes. They make good dance floors.
